category: Member sport group regulations/Article 30 (Number of group delegates and term of office)
contents: Article 30 (Number of delegates and term of office for group representatives) ① City/provincial sports councils shall determine in advance the number of delegates for each group group pursuant to Article 29 (4) according to the actual circumstances. Revised March 23, 2017. ② Delegates for each group have delegate status from the date of the relevant general meeting until the day before the next general meeting. Revised 2021. 10. 6.
